Description.name: Mountain Pose
Description.desc: This pose teaches one to stand with majestic steadiness like a mountain

Description.name: Tree Pose
Description.desc: This pose gives you a sense of grounding

Description.name: Downward Facing Dog Pose
Description.desc: This pose stretches hamstrings, chest and lengthens the spine

Description.name: Triangle Pose
Description.desc: It stretches the legs and torso, mobilizes the hips and promotes deep breathing

Description.name: Chair Pose
Description.desc: An intensely powerful pose, this one strengthens the muscles of the legs and arms
